name: I Want to Be Adoored
description:
A short game for TOJam.

Use WASD and Mouse to move and look around. Pick up objects with 'E', and click to use an object you're holding.

Credits:

TexturesJess Westlake3D ModellingBritney CoatesProgrammingPaul McMonagleAudio, Narrative and Level DesignAndrea LucSpecial ThanksRob Popiolek
